description: Security Configuration as Code - Financial Application Infrastructure
subject: Security Configuration as Code
constraints: S3 bucket for sensitive financial documents with encryption
IAM role with least-privilege access for S3 operations
SSE-S3 encryption for all data at rest
SSL/TLS enforcement for all S3 bucket requests
